description:
Allows proper platformer jumping.

How to use: assign the Jump command to a button on the hero model and the Fall command after each regular move option on the hero model (move north, east, etc). Assign the Maneuver function to the hero's default move options to allow horizontal control of the jump while airborne. These commands are meant for the hero but they can also be used for any map event.

WARNING! Due to how in-game collisions are coded, this plugin is still somewhat experimental. It may cause some bugs and make the characters clip through some objects, so build your maps carefully.
name: True jump
